data.title: Technology Partners
data.text:
Software Tree has recognized from its inception, the value of establishing partnerships with a range of companies, including technology vendors, system integrators, value-added resellers (VARs), and independent software developers (ISVs).

If you would like to be a partner, please contact us at partners@softwaretree.com.

As a lightweight, flexible, and scalable OR-Mapping technology, JDX offers an extremely easy-to-use solution to the complex problem of integrating Java/J2EE applications with relational databases.

I am very excited that JDX now works with our Coherence product to further enhance the scalability and reliability benefits of a high-performance clustered cache.

HiT JDBC/DB2 offers high performance, small footprint, and JDBC 2.0 conformance.

When combined with SoftwareTree's JDX object relational mapping technology, developers can deploy high performance object to database connectivity for existing DB2 servers. Trial downloads of HiT JDBC/DB2 are available at the HiT Software web site Information on our company can be found at - http://www.hitsw.com
